message: Let's divide it fairly, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I think 55-45 is more reasonable, considering we both want a fair share.
I can go down to 58-42, but that's as low as I'm willing to go for now.
I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, 52-48 is a fair compromise.
I'm still not convinced 52-48 is fair, how about we try 57-43?
I'm only willing to go up slightly, 52.5-47.5 is my new offer.
I'm willing to come down a bit more, 56.5-43.5 is my new offer.
I'm only willing to move slightly, 52.75-47.25 is my new offer. We're running out of time!
I'll come down a bit more, 56.25-43.75. Let's make a deal before time runs out!
I'm willing to go up a bit, 53-47 is my final serious offer. Let's split the difference!
I'll come down to 56-44, this is my final serious offer. If you reject, I'll assume you want to risk losing everything.
